Business Description:
Ace Exports is a fourth-generation family-run business of leather and shoe manufacturing, based upon a tradition of unmatched craftsmanship earned over eight decades. We have built on our inheritance of specialized experience and knowledge by assuring the highest quality of our products, equipped with the latest machinery and equipment, and a workforce of highly qualified professionals and skilled artisans, backed by twenty-first-century quality control.

At ACE, our commitment to quality extends to every step until the product is delivered to the customer's satisfaction. All sourcing and manufacturing is done to match the customer's requirement. A separate dispatch team monitors all export shipments, tracking every step from order receipt to order delivery. Our level of commitment is unmatched.

At ACE, the only acceptable standard of performance is the customer's complete satisfaction. A tour of the factory would reveal, to the discerning eye, all the ingredients to make high-performance and aesthetically appealing footwear are installed and in use. If a full leather sole is needed, the requisite technology is available. And if Genuine Hand-made Goodyear-welt and Hand-stitched down were sought, the wherewithal to make them is also indigenous to the factory.

A footwear expert will see a well-planned unit, housing advanced, versatile, and painstakingly-maintained machinery, run by dedicated, skilled personnel who obviously take pride in producing footwear that, as per their expertise and their company's policy, should set industry standards, matching and then surpassing the best anywhere in the world.

At Ace, our capacities may be modest, but our aspirations continue to climb. With tenacious resolve, we are focused on expanding our horizons towards rapidly changing technologies and higher production.

LEATHER PRODUCTS ACCESSORIES

Leather Product Design Studio - R&D Blueprint

Stage 1: Sample making is a crucial step in our design process. To cover the cost of pattern cutting and other development expenses, there are minimum charges for sample making. However, we value long-term relationships with our clients, and any extra charges paid for samples will be adjusted if you place an order on the same style with a minimum quantity of 100 pieces.

FOB Sample Price:

  1. For Bags: A fee of INR 3500 or 45 USD per piece applies, with uniform pricing across styles unless intricate designs or exotic leathers are involved.
  2. For Wallets & Small Leather Goods: A charge of INR 1000 or 12.5 USD per piece applies, with similar pricing flexibility based on design complexity and materials used.

As a token of appreciation for our esteemed regular clients, when you commission a production order for a minimum quantity of 100 wallets, we offer to craft 2 diverse wallet style samples at production cost. Similarly, for a production order encompassing a minimum of 100 bags, we provide the opportunity to create 2 distinct bag samples at production cost.

Stage 2: Production/Bulk Orders : For bulk orders, the Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) is set at 100 pieces per style and color. During bulk production, you will receive approval samples (3-5 pieces) for your evaluation and approval. Once approved, we will dispatch the bulk quantity to you within the next 20 days, with the approval sample prices matching the production order prices.

At Dream High, we are committed to delivering exceptional leather products that reflect your unique style and vision. Contact us today to explore our world of craftsmanship and design excellence. Together, we can bring your ideas to life in leather.

‍

‍

Business Description:
Our company is one of the leading manufacturers in India, It’s a family-owned business started in 1933. We are the fifth generation in manufacturing and producing leather and leather products. Our tannery is located at Ranipet, South India.

Tannery

Our tannery specializes in manufacturing finished leather that caters to the diverse needs of varied customers. We have the capability to convert raw leather into finished ones with fineness meeting stringent norms. We are fully equipped with innovative technology. We work towards eco-friendly and sustainability. Our ability to meet global standards, allows us to position our products among the leading Finished Leathers by strategically adopting a path to offer differentiated products – Leather in terms of quality, touch, feel color & so on. Though we have diversified processes to produce leathers in Cow, Buff, Sheep & Goat – our niche remains with Leathers made in Calf, Kips & Cow. With advances made, we have forayed with the same passion as done for Calf & Kips to make Buff another mainstay of our product range.

‍

Leather

We are one of the leading processes and manufacturers of premium leather quality. Our specialization lies in making Upper and Lining leather in Chrome, Chrome-free, and Veg from Cow-calf, Kips, Hides, Sheep, Goat, and Buff.

INFRASTRUCTURE:

The factory provides sufficient and suitable lighting, whether natural or artificial, in all areas where workers are working or passing through. The glazed windows and skylights used for lighting workrooms are cleaned on both their inner and outer surfaces. Effective provisions are made in every factory to prevent glare, whether directly from a source of light or by reflection from a smooth or polished surface, as well as the formation of shadows that may cause eyestrain or the risk of accidents for workers.

Provisions are made for ventilation and temperature regulation in the factories. Effective and suitable measures are adopted to secure and maintain adequate ventilation and a comfortable temperature for workers. The walls and roofs are of such material and design that the temperature does not exceed reasonable limits.

Our factory is kept clean and free from effluvia arising from any drain, privy, or other nuisance. Daily, dirt and refuse are removed from the floors, benches, staircases, and passages, and disposed of in a suitable manner. The floor of every room is cleaned at least once a day by washing, using disinfectant. All inside walls and partitions, all ceilings or tops of rooms, and all walls, sides, and tops of passages and staircases are painted or varnished and repainted and refurnished at least once every five years.

Where painting or varnishing is not required, the walls are kept white washed or color washed, and the white washing or color washing is carried out at least once every 12 months. Effective arrangements are made for the disposal of wastes and effluents arising out of the manufacturing process in the factories.

OUR MISSION:

  • People: Ensure that human development takes place through all endeavors, increasing value for all stakeholders.
  • Portfolio: Create world-class products without compromising on quality.
  • Citizenship: Be responsible citizens and work for the government and the country.
  • Partners: Nurture a winning network of customers and suppliers.
  • Planet: As responsible citizens, care for the environment by utilizing the most advanced environmental practices.

Business Description:
Laraib Exports - Crafting Excellence in Leather

Laraib Exports is a distinguished leather manufacturing unit with a journey that spans from the raw materials to exquisite finished products. With over 11 years of industry expertise, the company has established itself as a prominent exporter of premium leather and leather goods to numerous countries worldwide.

Our Expertise and Facilities

  • Equipped with state-of-the-art machinery and staffed by skilled artisans, Laraib Exports has been at the forefront of delivering top-notch quality leather products. Over the years, our commitment to evolving with the times has led to remarkable improvements in the quality of our leather, fostering unwavering confidence among our global clientele.
  • Specializing in vegetable-tanned Belting leather, safety and fashionable shoe upper leather, our products are crafted from carefully selected raw materials. Our full vegetable tanning process ensures a superior quality end product that meets the highest standards.

Product Range

Our diverse product range includes leather straps, snap belts, complete belts with buckles, as well as a variety of leather goods such as key rings, knife covers, diary covers, leather carpets, and stools. This eclectic range showcases our dedication to innovation and craftsmanship.

International Presence

Laraib Exports has made its mark in international markets, with our Leather and Leather products enjoying successful sales in Germany, the USA, and China. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has propelled our products to global acclaim.

Sustainable Practices

Committed to responsible manufacturing, Laraib Exports prioritizes the well-being of our employees and the environment. We continuously adapt our processes to ensure health and safety standards are met while minimizing waste through efficient material usage and energy conservation. Our dedication to research and development focuses on advancing technology that aligns with environmental standards.

Certifications

  • ISO 9001:2015 Certified Company
  • ISO 14001 Certified Company
  • Export House Recognized by the Government of India

Our Vision

Laraib Exports envisions being India's leading manufacturer and exporter of Leather Belts and Bags. Our mission is to provide our buyers with stylish, high-quality products that meet European reach norms. Timely delivery and customer satisfaction are our cornerstones, achieved through the efforts of our dedicated and innovative development team.

Decades of Excellence

  • With a legacy spanning three decades, Laraib Exports proudly conducts its business on a global scale. With an integrated approach from owning our tannery to producing finished items like Belts and Bags, we maintain a seamless process that ensures the highest standards of quality.
  • At Laraib Exports, we don't just produce leather goods – we craft experiences, weaving the finest materials with exceptional craftsmanship to create products that stand the test of time. For inquiries, collaborations, and orders, please reach out to us.

Business Description:
About Us

Mariam Fashions: Crafting Quality Leather Goods

Mariam Fashions is a legacy in the world of leather, spanning three generations of excellence. Our journey began with our grandfathers who were prominent Raw Leather traders. In the late 1960s, our father moved the family business from UP to Kolkata, West Bengal, where he continued to deal in Raw Leather, hides, and skins of cow, buffalo, goat, and sheep. Over time, he diversified into leather tanning, progressing from raw to wet blue processing.

When we, the third generation of the Mariam Fashions family, entered the leather business, we embarked on a journey from wet blue tanning to the production of high-quality finished leather. However, our vision extended beyond merely supplying finished leather to other exporters in Kolkata or India. We set out to utilize our own leather to craft exceptional leather goods, giving birth to the concept of Mariam Fashions.

Key Differentiators

  • Quality Focus: At Mariam Fashions, our commitment to quality is unwavering. We specialize in creating premium leather goods that cater to a global audience, ensuring that each buyer's specific requirements are our top priority.
  • Expert Team: Our success is attributed to our expert team of professionals who lead our research and development efforts and excel in quality management during production.
  • Customization: Understanding the unique needs of our clients is our forte. We offer customization options based on design, size, and shape, earning us the trust of clients who return to us repeatedly.

OUR PRODUCTS:

Our state-of-the-art infrastructure spans a wide landmass and is strategically divided into various departments. Each department is managed by a specialized team to ensure systematic business operations, efficiency, and product quality.

Quality Assurance

As a quality-centric organization, we have established a cutting-edge quality control laboratory where rigorous quality tests are conducted by experienced professionals. We adhere to industry-standard quality guidelines to deliver fault-free consignments to the market.

Customization

We understand our clients' unique needs and provide tailor-made solutions based on their designs, sizes, and shapes. Our commitment to customization has earned us the repeated trust of our clients.

Our Team

Mariam Fashions boasts a team of highly skilled professionals with a deep understanding of customer specifications. We conduct extensive market research to discern customer preferences and continually strive to meet those specifications.

In summary, Mariam Fashions is a multi-generation leather enterprise with a strong legacy in the industry. We have transitioned from raw leather trading to finished leather manufacturing and leather goods production. Our focus on quality, a dedicated team of experts, and a commitment to customization have made us a trusted name in the global leather market. We take pride in delivering top-quality leather goods that cater to the diverse needs of our esteemed clientele worldwide.

Founded in India in 1990 by visionary entrepreneurs, Om Leather Artdeco embarked on a mission to redefine leather craftsmanship for the modern world. End-to-End Solutions

Business Description:
Welcome to LINDSEY STREET: A Timeless Journey of Leather Craftsmanship

Experience the Epitome of Luxury and Elegance at LINDSEY STREET

Step into the world of LINDSEY STREET, where we embark on a timeless journey of leather craftsmanship. Since our establishment in 2020 in the vibrant city of joy, Kolkata, West Bengal, India, our brand has become synonymous with unwavering quality, sophistication, and impeccable attention to detail.

From its humble beginnings, LINDSEY STREET has evolved into a distinguished name in the realm of leather goods. Our unwavering passion for craftsmanship, coupled with a deep appreciation for the rich heritage of leatherworking, has been the driving force behind our resounding success. Each meticulously crafted piece we create is a testament to our unwavering commitment to excellence and our dedication to preserving the art of traditional leather craftsmanship.

Exceptional Craftsmanship by Skilled Artisans

At LINDSEY STREET, we take immense pride in our team of skilled artisans who possess a wealth of experience and expertise, honed over generations. Their meticulous attention to detail allows us to create products of exceptional beauty and functionality. From hand-selecting the finest hides to executing precise stitching and finishing touches, every step of our production process is handled with the utmost care and precision.

Uncompromising Quality and Enduring Appeal

LINDSEY STREET is committed to sourcing the highest quality materials from trusted suppliers, ensuring that our products not only exude elegance but also stand the test of time. We firmly believe in the enduring appeal of genuine leather and its ability to develop a rich patina, telling the unique story of its wearer.

Where Tradition Meets Innovation

While we celebrate the timeless traditions of leather craftsmanship, we also embrace innovation and contemporary design. Our collection seamlessly blends classic aesthetics with modern sensibilities, catering to individuals who appreciate the fusion of tradition and innovation. With a diverse range of products, from stylish handbags and wallets to refined accessories and travel essentials, LINDSEY STREET provides the perfect companion for every occasion.

Responsible Practices and Sustainable Commitment

At LINDSEY STREET, we are not only dedicated to crafting exceptional leather goods but also to practicing responsible and sustainable approaches. We carefully manage our production processes and prioritize the use of eco-friendly materials whenever possible, striving to minimize our environmental impact.

Building a Community and Lasting Relationships

Our journey extends beyond creating beautiful products; it is about fostering a sense of community. We value building lasting relationships with our customers, sharing our passion for leather craftsmanship, and creating unforgettable experiences. Your satisfaction and trust are at the heart of everything we do.

Join Us on a Timeless Journey

Thank you for joining us on this timeless journey. Explore our collection, discover unparalleled craftsmanship, and indulge in the allure of LINDSEY STREET. From exquisite briefcases, desk organizers, and jewelry boxes to leather tote bags, women's handbags, office laptop bags, crossbody bags, sling bags, clutches, wallets, leather jackets, and dresses, we offer a wide range of unique leather goods. We even provide complimentary customization services for leather jackets, ensuring a truly personalized experience.
Products: Exquisite Briefcases, Desk Organizers, and Leather Tote Bags, Women's Handbags, Laptop Bags, Crossbody Bags, Wallets, Pouches, Hobo Bags, Leather Jackets, Bar Accessories, Cushion Covers, Gloves and other leather products

Business Description:
Trident Exports -"The Texture of Character: Let Our Leather Narrate Your Distinctive Tale".

In today's fast-paced, ever-evolving global economy, the need for efficient and skilled personnel is paramount for achieving organizational excellence. Trident Exports, headquartered in the vibrant city of Kolkata, is a shining example of dedication and innovation in the export industry. Our name alone speaks volumes about our commitment to quality and excellence.

A Legacy of Innovation:

Trident Exports is a third-generation company that has mastered the art of transforming creativity into reality. We pride ourselves on crafting unique and globally appreciated fantasy products. Our creations are characterized by their chic designs, unexpected twists, brilliant colors, meticulous attention to detail, and exquisite finishing, all of which have played a pivotal role in establishing our brand's prominence.

Uncompromising Quality:

At Trident Exports, we believe in using only the finest materials. Our preference for organic leather reflects our commitment to luxury and sustainability. Our collection features vibrant and vivid colors that add a touch of elegance to every piece.

From Hide to Handcrafted:

With our own tannery and leather goods factory, we ensure that every step of the production process, from raw skins and hides to finished leather goods, is meticulously carried out. This hands-on approach allows us to maintain the highest quality standards in the industry.

Global Recognition:

Our unique blend of charm, innovation, organic leather, bespoke fittings, and trendsetting designs has earned Trident Exports a well-deserved global reputation. We are proud to be recognized worldwide for our excellence in the export industry.

History

The art of working with leather is one of the oldest known to humanity, dating back to our earliest ancestors who used animal skins for protection. At Trident Exports, we combine this rich heritage with modern scientific advancements. Our ongoing research and commitment to innovation ensure that our products consistently meet the evolving needs of today's world.

Global Reach

We take pride in exporting finished leather and leather products to a diverse range of countries, including:

  • United Kingdom (U.K.), France, Germany, Netherlands, Switzerland, Spain, Australia, Hong Kong, China, Belgium, Denmark, Sweden.

Our dedication to quality and innovation transcends borders, and we continue to serve customers across the globe with unmatched craftsmanship and exceptional products.

Business Description:
FERSHU is a brand of leather shoes, and we are passionate about making patina-finish shoes. We are one of the few custom-made shoe companies in India, and we pride ourselves on our quality. Our handmade shoes allow for a patina finish, which means that you can choose from a wide variety of leathers, colors, patterns, and styles for your footwear.

‍

‍OUR PRODUCTS

At FERSHU, we are dedicated to delivering quality and style. We offer a diverse range of designs to choose from, including the latest trends in footwear for both men and women. Our collection features a wide selection of colors and styles to suit every taste. Our products are made from only the finest materials, ensuring that they are durable and built to last for years to come.

‍

COLLECTION OF SHOES

BROGUE SHOES

  • Type: Slip-on
  • Available color: British Tan & Black

DERBY BROGUE PATINA

  • The derby shoes feature a British tan color with an Argentinian leather outsole and are made of genuine leather.
  • The shoes are handmade in India by expert shoemakers.
  • Available color: Brown & British Tan.

MONK STRAPS LEATHER SHOES

  • Types: Single and Double Monk Strap Shoes.
  • Available color: Black & Brown.
  • Premium full grain upper leather and soles are made up of TPR for smooth and comfortable wear.

‍

OXFORD SHOES

  • The whole-cut oxford shoes are made of fine quality full-grain leather and are carefully handcrafted by experts.
  • Leather lining provides that extra comfort and breathability
  • Argentinian Leather outsole is softer and more durable than pure synthetic materials
  • The Patina color finish gives the shoes a vintage look.
  • Available colors: British Tan, Burgundy, Oxblood, Navy blue.

‍

LOAFERS

  • Type: Loafer
  • Available Color: Navy blue, White, Brown, Tan.
  • Soles are made up of TPR for smooth and comfortable wear.

‍

VISION

FERSHU is a brand that aims to offer its customers an authentic experience of genuine leather at an affordable price. We strive to bring happiness to people around the world by providing them with great products. We believe that every customer deserves to have nice, quality shoes that fit within their budget. FERSHU provides customers with high-quality, hand-crafted shoes at an affordable price so that everyone can enjoy the authentic feel of genuine leather.

‍

QUALITY

When it comes to leather shoes, quality is the most important factor. However, with the influx of new brands in today's market, it can be challenging to distinguish between good and subpar brands. Quality shoe manufacturing starts with the procurement of raw materials. At FERSHU, our team of experts ensures that we only use high-quality materials in our production process. We are a startup company that offers high-end leather shoes at affordable prices. Our team has over 15 years of experience in this field.
Products: BROGUE SHOES, DERBY BROGUE PATINA, LOAFERS, OXFORD SHOES, MONK STRAPS LEATHER SHOES.

Business Description:
Diamond Agro Export is a newly established company dealing in fresh fruits and vegetables. We started in 2020, experienced team of employees and knowledge of the food industry is second to none. By combining all the resources and using organic growing techniques, we, as a manufacturer and supplier, are able to offer fruits and vegetable of highest quality to our customers. From Fresh Banana, Orange,  Muskmelon to Red Chili, Green Lemon, Onion, Garlic and more, our product range is vast and is constantly getting greater every day.

We are mainly exporting onion from Nasik Pimpalgaon and quality and shelf life is high compare to other regions. Currently exporting Onion in around 50 to 60 containers a month to Dubai, Oman, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, and Singapore.

In addition to that, we also export

  • Chilly
  • Grapes
  • Rice
  • Wheat Flour
  • Sugar
  • Pomegranate
